long_description: An entry-level powerhouse, the Raleigh Talus 4.0 mountain bike has a shock-absorbent fork, powerful disc brakes and 24 versatile gears-everything you need to get out there and have a good time. SR Suntour XCT suspension fork offers 80mm of travel with preload adjustment to tune your ride. Tektro Novela mechanical disc brakes offer powerful stopping power no matter the conditions. Shimano 24-speed drivetrain features triple cranks and responsive derailleurs to take on any gradient of terrain; intuitive trigger shifters deliver quick, easy shifts. Butted aluminum frame features a formed down tube for excellent power transfer, durability and handling performance. Sturdy double wall rims are outfitted with Kenda tires for fast-rolling trail traction. Specs on the Raleigh Talus 4.0 hardtail mountain bike are subject to change.
